hero.title: Transform one source into complete social media content
hero.subtitle: Turn any article, video, audio, or idea into a full suite of multimedia content for Instagram, TikTok, X, and LinkedIn. Automated from start to finish.

HomePage.socialProof: Trusted by creators and agencies worldwide

howItWorks.title: Works in 3 simple steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Omnia's automation process is designed to save you time and effort.

step1.title: Connect a Source
step1.description: Provide anything â€“ an article URL, a YouTube video, an audio file, or just an idea.

step2.title: AI Generates Content
step2.description: Omnia analyzes the source and automatically creates a full suite of multimedia content for multiple platforms.

step3.title: Schedule & Publish
step3.description: Review, refine if needed, and schedule your posts across all channels with just a few clicks.

HomePage.featuresTitle: Everything you need to automate social media
HomePage.featureSubtitle: Powerful AI tools that transform any content into platform-ready posts

feature1.title: Multi-Source Input
feature1.description: Easily create content from articles, videos, audio, or text prompts.

feature2.title: Multi-Platform Generation
feature2.description: Automatically create optimized content drafts for Instagram, TikTok, X, and LinkedIn from one source.

feature3.title: AI-Generated Media
feature3.description: Get complete posts with AI-generated captions, images, and videos tailored for each platform.

feature4.title: AI Chat Assistant
feature4.description: Refine your content with natural language commands like `make this funnier` or `create a different image`.

feature5.title: Smart Scheduling
feature5.description: Schedule posts across all platforms with a visual calendar and automatic optimal timing suggestions.

feature6.title: Direct Publishing
feature6.description: Connect your social accounts once and publish directly without leaving the platform.

HomePage.useCasesSubtitle: Turn ideas into content faster than ever, no matter who you are.

card.title: Repurpose Long-Form Video
description: Turn a long YouTube video into 10 short clips for Reels and TikTok.
Automatically extract key points to create Twitter threads.
Generate thumbnails and pull-quotes from your video content.

card.title: Transform Blog Posts
description: Convert a blog post into an insightful LinkedIn series.
Create image carousels for Instagram from key arguments.
Summarize articles into short-form Facebook posts.

card.title: Create from an Idea
description: Start with just an idea, and let AI develop it into a video script.
Generate multiple caption variations for A/B testing.
Plan an entire week's content from just a few bullet points.

card.title: Manage Multiple Clients
description: Generate content in bulk for different brands from various sources.
Maintain consistent brand voice with the AI Assistant.
Save hours of work each week to focus on strategy.

testimonial.quote: Omnia completely changed how we do marketing. We're saving over 20 hours a week, and our social media presence has never been better.

metric1.label: Hours Saved Weekly

metric2.label: Content Output

metric3.label: Engagement Growth

PricingPage.headerTitle: Choose the Right Plan for Your Creativity
PricingPage.headerSubtitle: Whether you're just starting out or you're a professional agency, Omnia has a plan designed for you. Start for free today!
PricingPage.creditSystemTitle: How Does Our Credit System Work?
PricingPage.creditSystemSubtitle: A single, flexible type of Credit for all your creative needs.

creditSystem.note: Applies when the source is a prompt/text and only generates a caption.
Cost includes caption generation and 1 AI image.
Text-to-Video flow: Creates a new short video from text (includes script, voiceover, video, caption).
Each project gets 3 free fine-tuning requests; subsequent requests are charged.
Video-to-Video flow: Cost is based on the duration of your uploaded source video. Includes transcription, automatic B-roll finding and stitching, background music, logo, and dynamic subtitles.

PricingPage.topUpSubtitle: You can easily purchase additional Credit packs to continue your work without upgrading your subscription. Top-up credits never expire.

faqs.question: Do credits roll over to the next month?
faqs.answer: Credits from your monthly subscription are renewed each billing cycle and do not accumulate. Credits purchased as a Top-up will never expire.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from the billing management page. You will still have access to the features of your paid plan until the end of the current billing cycle.

faqs.question: What's the difference between "AI Video Generation" and "Video Processing"?
faqs.answer:
"AI Video Generation" (20 Credits/instance): You provide an idea (text), and Omnia will write a script and generate a completely new video for you.
"Video Processing" (5 Credits/minute): You already have a video (self-shot, interview...), and Omnia will automatically add subtitles, insert illustrative B-roll, and turn it into a professional clip.

header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Omnia

faqs.q: What exactly does your service do?
faqs.a: We help content creators streamline their social media presence by scheduling, scripting, and generating content across TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram. Our platform can:
list: Generate captions and hashtags tailored for engagement.
Create short-form video drafts (ready for you to edit or post).
Schedule everything so you can stay consistent without burning out.

steps: You tell us your niche, target audience, and preferred platforms.
Our AI and creative team generate scripts, captions, and/or video drafts for you.
You review, approve, or request edits.
We help you schedule your content so it goes live at the best times for engagement.
faqs.note: Think of it as having a content studio on autopilot.

faqs.q: Who owns the content you create for me?
faqs.a: You do. 100%. Everything we generateâ€”scripts, captions, videosâ€”belongs to you once delivered.

faqs.q: Can I make edits to the scripts or videos?
faqs.a: Absolutely. You can edit scripts, captions, and video drafts directly in our platform before posting. We encourage customization so your unique voice shines through.

faqs.q: Do you offer a free trial?
faqs.a: Yes! We offer a 7-day free trial so you can test the workflow before committing.
Currently: TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Instagram Reels. We're working on expanding to LinkedIn and X (Twitter).

faqs.q: How do you ensure the scripts and captions match my style?
faqs.a: During onboarding, we'll ask about your tone, niche, and audience preferences. Our system then learns your style and generates drafts tailored to your voice. You can always provide feedback to fine-tune results.
We can't guarantee a specific number of followers or viewsâ€”social media algorithms are unpredictable. What we do guarantee is:
list: High-quality scripts and captions tailored for engagement.
A streamlined workflow that saves you time.
faqs.note: Consistency + quality = the foundation for growth.

faqs.a: Yes, all subscriptions are month-to-month. Cancel anytime with no hidden fees.
We provide refunds within the first 14 days of your first paid plan if you're not satisfied.

faqs.q: What if I need human help?
faqs.a: We have a support team (real humans!) available via chat and email. For Pro and Agency plans, we also offer one-on-one onboarding calls.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
